actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-223.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #168 (213-192).

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigation and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Assassinations.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-223) Directs the payment of expenses, not to exceed $2,514,400, out of the contingent fund of the House for investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Assassinations.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigation and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Assassinations.
